QuestData.Title: Setting the Trap
QuestData.Description: Take these 3 ritual stones to the location I have marked on your map. There, you will find a Shan'ze ritual object that you can use to beckon one of their powerful allies.$B$BYou will need capable friends at your side for this trap to work. Do not go alone, for these will be some of the Thunder King's most powerful servants.$B$BWhen your enemy shows itself, show no mercy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use 3 Shan'ze Ritual Stones to beckon a Champion of the Thunder King, and then kill him.
